text: Shikotsu-Tōya National Park (In Japanese:支笏洞爺国立公園, Shikotsu Tōya kokuritsu Kōen) is a national Park that is in the western part of the island of Hokkaidō in Japan. The total area is estimated to be 993.02 Square Kilometres. == Gallery == Image:Mount Tarumae.jpg|Mount Tarumae as seen from Lake Shikotsu Image:Yotei-zan-from-hirafu.jpg|Mount Yōtei Image:Noboribetsu hot spring jigokudani.JPG|Noboribetsu hot spring Image:Lake Shikotsu Mt Monbetsu01n4272.jpg|Lake Shikotsu == Other websites == * * * Shikotsu-Toya National Park Habitat Center of Japan * Tōya Usu Geopark (English, Japanese) Category:National parks in Japan Category:Hokkaido Prefecture
title: Shikotsu-Tōya National Park
